item.title: Github actions configured
item.description: If this post will appear, it will mean that SSH keys configured for the repo and the workflow configured for github actions are working

item.title: My First Post
item.description: MVP Following one of the agile principles of having an MVP, I decided to setup this website using Hugo, github pages and github actions with the minimal configuration required, only the essential needed. I’ll do the modifications as I progress in learning.
